featuresAndTraits.name: Darkvision
featuresAndTraits.description: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet as if it were dim light.

featuresAndTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
featuresAndTraits.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

featuresAndTraits.name: Lay on Hands
featuresAndTraits.description: Can heal wounds up to a total amount equal to five times your paladin level.
